page.title: 05DEBENHAMS STORE,CHELMSFORD
page.content: Debenhams is a large{Department store} and employs almost 500 staff.The store is housed in a building 100 years old and actually comprises 3 original stores.A road once passed through the site and the store was originally called Bonds. The store is situated at the southern end of the{High Street}but also has a rear escalator access to the recently redeveloped area of the old{Gray's {Brewery Yard}in the{Springfield Road. The store requires a 3-ton lorry to ferry stock requirements from their warehouse to the store;the store takes between Â£150,000 - Â£500,000 per week. The store Security department covers both staff and customers;staff sign in and out of the store and everyone is alert to detect shoplifters and to notice unattended packages which might contain a terrorist bomb.
